name: excel-to-pdf-mcp_convert_excel_to_pdf
description: Converts Excel files (.xls, .xlsx) to PDF format

input_path.description: Relative path to the Excel file (.xls, .xlsx) to convert

output_format.description: Output format (currently only PDF is supported)
